thread.title: Northwest Portland resident fires gun at burglar in early morning break-in, police say
thread.title_full: Northwest Portland resident fires gun at burglar in early morning break-in, police say | OregonLive.com

author: Noelle Crombie | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Northwest Portland resident fires gun at burglar in early morning break-in, police say
text:
Portland police early Thursday responded to a report of a burglary in which the resident fired a gun at the burglar.
Police got the call about the incident about 3:40 a.m. The burglary occurred at a home in the 2700 block of Northwest Quimby Street.
The burglar ran when someone living in the home fired a gun and was later found in a vacant residence in the 2700 block of Northwest Pettygrove Street.
The burglar was arrested and taken to a Portland hospital for treatment of a condition unrelated to the incident.
No other information was immediately available.
-- The Oregonian
